course-standard.description: private tutoring in saxophone from Liam Trawick

objective.description: how to put it together, how to clean it, how to store it

icans.ican: I can identify the reed, ligature, mouthpiece, neck, and body of the horn.
I can remove the reed and properly store it.

objective.description: proper embouchure, making a full sound

icans.ican: I can identify the symbol for treble clef.
I can identify the notes for the lines and spaces on the treble staff.
